Name: wgipam
Description: Command wgipamd implements an IP Address Management (IPAM) daemon for dynamic IP address assignment to WireGuard peers, using the wg-dynamic protocol. Apache 2.0 Licensed.

Name: talks
Description: Talks by Matt Layher.  MIT Licensed.

Name: homelab
Description: Configuration management for Matt Layher's machines. MIT Licensed.

Name: devlink
Description: Package devlink provides access to Linux's devlink interface. MIT Licensed.

Name: vsock
Description: Package vsock provides access to Linux VM sockets (AF_VSOCK) for communication between a hypervisor and its virtual machines.  MIT Licensed.

Name: monkey-rs
Description: A Rust implementation of the Monkey programming language from https://interpreterbook.com/. MIT Licensed.

Name: arp
Description: Package arp implements the ARP protocol, as described in RFC 826. MIT Licensed.

Name: rtorrent_exporter
Description: Prometheus exporter that exposes metrics from rTorrent. MIT Licensed.

Name: rtorrent
Description: Package rtorrent implements a client for rTorrent.  MIT Licensed.

Name: mdlayher.com
Description: Matt Layher's personal static website. MIT Licensed.
